word: ELLEN G. WHITE AND HER HELPERS WERE SENT TO AUSTRALIA TO WORK IN PIONEER LINES IN A CONTINENT ONLY SHORTLY BEFORE OPENED TO THE MESSAGE. FINANCIAL SUPPORT FROM THE HOME BASE WAS MEAGER AND SHE HAD TO DRAW ON LIMITED PERSONAL FUNDS TO ADVANCE THE WORK THERE, AND EVEN SO SHE AND HER WORKING STAFF LIVED MOST SACRIFICIALLY IN ORDER TO ENTER UPON THE OPENING PROVIDENCES OF GOD.
